overview: Vilomina girl from the bottom of the city of Naples .. It is forced by poverty and need for vice, but as a very complex entity .. It is from within completely reject this trend .. She believes in motherhood .. But fond of children overflowing affection Which can be considered as the most important feelings are motherhood, and for her to live almost like a servant to Dominico Surrealo, the same living for his pleasures in disregard of all values ​​and of course with this does not recognize any responsibility and Flomina eventually forced him to marry her after she represented the supervisor of death but After marriage, she jumps out of the bed of illness, which was nothing but a trick to steal herself Her three sons are a life and a special project entity. One of them is his son, but she does not allow him to remain as a mother until the mother gives the same treatment and the same rights.
title: مسرحية جوازه طليانى
